mdRecord.dcterms:title: Walt Whitman: Liberal, and Lusty as Nature by Will Stutts
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the play Walt Whitman: Liberal, and Lusty as Nature by Will Stutts. Produced by Rex Partington, directed by Greg Giovanni, production design by Steven Keever, costume design by Sandra-Christine, lighting design by John Broadus, stage manager by Jerry Matheny. Cast: Will Stutts as Walt Whitman. 1992 Guest Artist Series. Staff for the Barter Theatre: Artistic director: Rex Partington. Business Manager: Pearl Hayter. Director of marketing and promotions: Lori Ward. Sales manager: Robin Carmack. Company manager/production secretary: Bettina Jeffers. Promotions assistant: Leslie Peterson. Administrative clerk: Kathy Tate. production manager: Tony Partington. Scene shop foreman/master carpenter: Gray DaNeil. Technical consultant/master carpenter: Greg Owens. Master carpenter: William Gore. Master electrician: William J. Sauerbrey III. Electrician: John Broadus. Properties manager: David Montgomery. Properties artisan/production associate: Matthew Brown. Properties assistant: Marjorie Terry. Costume shop manager: Stacey B. Riley. Costumer: Kathryn K. Conrad. Youth stage coordinator: John Hardy. Production stage manager: Myrle Curry. Playhouse stage manager: Jerry Matheny. Day box office manager: Delores Moore. Evening box office manager: Allison Linder. Buildings and grounds: Amos Gobble, Garnett Fields. Housekeeper: Susanne Boulle, Nicholas Piper. Acting fellows ensemble: Jeff Gillenwater, Morrisa Harr, Penny Henderson, James Hubbert, Tricia Kelly, Renee Miller, Sheryl Ogg, Tom Roddy, Jeremy S. Van Meter. Apprentices: Candy Barefoot, Amanda Dooley, Scott Talbutt.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
